Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, RAMO, CODPRODU, CODSUBES, NRCERTIF, DIGCERT, IDTPSEGU, DATCMD, DATORR, DATTEC, CODCAU, COD_MOEDA_SINI, SITUACAO, FONTE FROM SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND RAMO = :RAMO AND CODCAU = :CODCAU AND DATTEC BETWEEN ?SI0UW01.W-DTSINI-INI AND ?SI0UW01.W-DTSINI-FIM ORDER BY 2, 4, 13 END SQL
